fields.name: interpersonal relationship
fields.value: Establish and maintain good interpersonal relationships, be good at listening to others, understand different points of view, and be able to reach consensus in cooperation. Interpersonal skills enable partners, customers and employees to collaborate and f

fields.name: leader
fields.value: Set clear goals and provide guidance for achieving them. Emphasis on teamwork and open communication, encourage employees to be creative, so as to achieve higher performance.

fields.name: strategic plan
fields.value: Set long-term goals and develop a detailed plan to achieve them. Have deep insight into market trends and competitive environment, so as to adjust strategies to adapt to changes. Consider the big picture when formulating business strategy while paying att

fields.name: innovative thinking
fields.value: Possess keen insight and creativity. The constant search for new solutions drives the company to remain competitive in the market. Have the courage to try new fields and gain new opportunities and breakthroughs from them.
